node.name: Awesome-Books
node.description: AWESOME BOOKS is web application project that allows users to add/remove books from a list and display them on the screen

node.name: Recipe-App
node.description: Recipe-App keep track of all user's recipes, recipe’s ingredients lists, and user’s food inventory. The user can generate a shopping list based on the inventory. Recipe-App allows a user to share recipes.

node.name: Leaderboard
node.description: Leaderboard is a web application that displays sorted scores. Leaderboard stores participants' scores in an API. The participants’ scores are retrieved, sorted, and displayed each time the refresh button is pressed

node.name: Zoo-Animals
node.description: Zoo-Animal is a web application that displays zoo animals' information details. It retrieves data from Zoo Animal API, and displays all the animals retrieved and the data related to each animal.

node.name: Budget-App
node.description: Budget-App is a mobile web application. It allows a registered user to manage an expense budget by categorizing and tracking each expense. Budget-App is built with Ruby on Rails.

node.name: W.G.T-Summit-2021
node.description: Web portal of the World Globalization Trade Summit 2021. W.G.T-Summit-2021 inform about WGT summit (venue, speaker, date, etc..)
